fields.description:
When we play a video in a webView in Android, we are not able to maximize the screen of the video.
Tested with YouTube,Vimeo,etc and found the same issue.
Here is the code snippet used for playing the video through HTML:
{code}
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<body>

<embed
width="420" height="345"
src="http://www.youtube.com/embed/ATJlxjC4-n0">
</embed>

</body>
</html>

{code}

or

{code}
<html>
<head>
	<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width,user-scalable=yes,initial-scale=1">
</head>
<body>
	<iframe width="300" height="169" src="http://www.youtube.com/embed/ATJlxjC4-n0" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>
</body>
</html>
{code}
fields.summary: Android: Not able to maximize(fullscreen) the video in a webView
